column1:
1,,Spicy shrimp tacos with garlic cilantro lime slaw,,20,,10,,30,,426,,Sauce: Pulse the oil, water, cilantro, scallions, garlic, lime juice, greek yogurt and some salt in a food processor or blender until mostly smooth.
Slaw: Toss some of the sauce (not all) with the cabbage. We’ll use the leftover sauce to top the tacos.
Shrimp: Pat the shrimp dry with paper towels. Toss the shrimp in a small bowl with the spice mix (chili powder, cumin, onion powder, garlic powder, cayenne and some salt) to get it coated. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the shrimp to the hot pan and saute for 5-8 minutes, flipping occasionally, until the shrimp are cooked through.
Assembly: For the prettiest and easiest-to-eat assembly, go in this order: smashed avocado, slaw, and shrimp. Finish with Cotjia cheese, lime wedges, and extra sauce.
,,Mexican; Healthy; Dinner; Lunch

2,,Chicken and brocoli,,10,,10,,20,,0,,Combine the oyster sauce, soy sauce, salt, pepper and garlic powder in a large bowl.
Cut the chicken thighs in 1/2 inch stripes.
Put the chicken in the bowl with the sauce and mix well so all the chicken is coated and marinate for 1/2 a day.
Bring a pot of salted water to a boil.
Cut the broccoli florets and wash them as needed.
When the water is boiling, put the broccoli in. Wait until the water boils again and remove after one minute. Set aside.
Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a pan and cook the chicken.
When cooked, add the broccoli and mix well until the broccoli is covered in sauce.
This recipe goes very well with rice,,Asian; Healthy; Dinner; Lunch

3,,Peer and apple sauce,,15,,20,,35,,0,,Peel the apples and peers and cut in 1 inch chunks.
Put the apples and peers and the vanilla in a pot with the water. Bring to a boil and cover. Let cook for 15-20 minutes.
For a sweeter experience, add some sugar or make a caramel and incorporate.
If you like with chucks, roughly mash with a  fork or a potato masher. For a smooth apple sauce, blend in a food processor.,,,Vegetarian; Dessert; Healthy
